sockets.display_string: Hop onto a plank of wood with a haphazard shadowflame rocket attachment. Absolutely nothing could go wrong, but if it did, deal 645,517 Shadowflame damage split between you and enemies caught in the theoretical blast.
+181 Primary Stat and opponent's failed interrupt attempts grant Precognition

spells.description: Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, there is a high chance to redirect the consequences to the nearest enemy player.

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 577,937 damage to your primary target and 124,309 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

spells.description:
Use: Summon an Earthen Delivery Drill to dig for an assortment of battleground buffs.

The drill lasts for 28 sec and can only be summoned while in combat. Can only be used in unrated battlegrounds and in War Mode on Khaz Algar. (15 Min Cooldown)
Equip: When the tinker slotted within this device malfunctions, there is a high chance to redirect the consequences to the nearest enemy player.
